Sentencas: In this work, the three-dimensional (3-D) microstructure of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) composite electrode is reconstructed by a random particle packing procedure and a geometrical dilating process, based on which the different tortuosity factors (t) are calculated by solving the steady state charge conservation equation in different percolated networks.
Titulo: The tortuosity factor e ff ect on solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: After that, the effects of the different t on cell performance are analyzed by a one-dimensional (1-D) SOFC performance simulation model, in which the electrochemical reactions and the gas/ion/electron transport are coupled.
Titulo: The tortuosity factor e ff ect on solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: The results indicate that the tortuosity factor of the ion-conducting phase in SOFC cathode (tio,c) plays the most important role and up to 62% SOFC performance improvement can be expected by decreasing tio,c.
Titulo: The tortuosity factor e ff ect on solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: In addition, by decreasing the tortuosity factor of the gas phase (tgas,a) and the ion-conducting phase in SOFC anode (tio,a), 1.7% and 17% performance improvement can be achieved, respectively.
Titulo: The tortuosity factor e ff ect on solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: This work could help improving SOFC performance by modifying the tortuous transport paths in SOFC porous electrodes.
Titulo: The tortuosity factor e ff ect on solid oxide fuel cell performance
